website_summaries.verdict: With a bonus USB port, this charging pad can top off 2 Qi-enabled phones plus another non-Qi device via wired charging.
pros: Charges all Qi-enabled phones, even through thick cases
Temperature sensor protects phones from heat damage
Equipped with USB port to charge a non-Qi-compatible device via cable
Charges even if device isn't centered perfectly on charging spot
cons: Flashing indicator lights can be disruptive in a dark room

customer_reviews.title: CUSTOMER SERVICE is AWESOME!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I received this product and within the first day or two I knew that it was not working properly but I really couldn’t do much about it because my son had thrown the box away – reached out to customer service and within about an hour I had a response and have someone taking care of the issue. After trying to resolve the issue they went above and beyond and Offered a replacement or refund and I’m so glad I chose a replacement. THIS WORKS PERFECT for both my new iphone Xr HIGHLY RECOMMEND product because IT WORKS but CUSTOMER SERVICE IS TOP NOTCH
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So many better options (possibly all of them)
customer_reviews.text: As mentioned, the charging placement “zone” for your phone is very small and temperamental. Many days I’ve gone to bed with the charging light illuminated and woken up to it off and 10 or 20% battery. It was frequent enough that I resorted to using the side USB port on the wireless charger to charge my phone with a cord. Now that’s rock bottom. But it gets worse. Sometimes with the cord I get the same low battery in the AM hanging gone to sleep with my phone displaying a charge was occurring. It’s bad. Look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: I think it is a great product, but the LEDs turn a room into a disco!
customer_reviews.text: I would give it 5 stars if it didn't have the annoying flashing lights. This products checks all the boxes for me, but my room at night turns into a disco. Who though the iPhone users needs flashing LED lights? This must be the obnoxious Android thing. Please give us an ability to turn off the LED lights as they serve no real purpose. I can always tap a screen on my phone to see if the phone is charging.
customer_reviews.author: mlody_me

customer_reviews.title: No good, don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Looks sleek but that's the only positive. The apple charging port is loose and doesn't hold the cord in. Tried multiple different apple cords and all of them easily slipped out. On the occasion that the cord does stay in place, it randomly stops charging phone before the phone is 100%. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brian J. Suminski

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I recently bought two new iPhones. I was looking for one charging device instead of having to plug them both in. This wireless charger works perfectly! Even with cases on the phone there is no problems. The extra USB ports is a nice addition. I can charge both phones wireless and charge up my iPad at the same time. Great product! Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping and great product! One of the few I could find ...
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping and great product! One of the few I could find that came with a wall charger. It’s a good looking charger too, not an eyesore like some of the other chargers out there. It charges my iPhone 8plus right through the leather case and quickly! No more kinked, tangled cords! Thanks LXORY!
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Two phones can charge at the same time.
customer_reviews.text: I find this charging pad to work as claimed. It accommodates 2 phones side by side. But, if you put one of those buttons on the back of your phone, that makes it too thick to be recharged on this pad.
customer_reviews.author: Pat McMahon

customer_reviews.title: Love the convenience
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, nice to have one charging pad for both of our phones. Have had same issue as others that sometimes only one of the phones remained fully charged overnight, not sure but it seems to be the second phone. Still would recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product and after 2 months it stopped working -- no longer charges the phone and makes a pinging noise. I have contacted the seller and am waiting for a response but either way it no longer works!
customer_reviews.author: P. Reeves

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a couple months and only use it when I have people over. It can charge two phones at once without any problem. Works well for both iPhone and Samsung. It doesn't fast charge, but I'm happy with it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Saad Bunny

customer_reviews.title: works  great!
customer_reviews.text: Will charge two LG G7 with heavy duty case and smart watch at the same time. Excellent!
customer_reviews.author: R. Knightly

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for 4 months to charge my Galaxy S10. I initially bought it to charge both my S10 and my Galaxy Buds. However, I stopped using it for the buds after it overheated several times. I should have returned it then. Now after 4 months It lights up and seems to work, but my phone no longer charges. Do not buy this!
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice but look elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: When it does “catch” the phone to charge it, it charges very slowly. My wife just had her phone on it for about 2 hours and it charged it a whole 2%. Have only owned it a couple of months. Doesn’t charge Apple watches unless you weigh the watch down with putting something on top of it.
customer_reviews.author: Omar Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stay connected with power strip
customer_reviews.text: I may have simply received a bad charger. The power cord constantly disconnects. It's extremely sensitive. It got to the point where this wasn't effective I spent more time fixing the connector than time charging effectively. Again, could be a bad batch, but I won't be rolling the dice on this one in the future.
customer_reviews.author: MacKenzie Rollison

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work well
customer_reviews.text: You must find the sweet spot to charge you phone, if not when you get up in the morning you have less battery life then when you went to bed. I tossed the box or I would have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Dory

customer_reviews.title: Design.
customer_reviews.text: I use it to charge my iPhone and AirPods, they work and are quick to charge both at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Louis Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Overall a great product
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is great, works as advertised and charging my Airpods 2 and iPhone. HOWEVER, be advised that the 18W wall charger supplied with the product is VERY cheaply made and you shouldn't count on it. Mine failed after being connected to power for only a few hours. As long as you make sure to get a decent wall charger separately, it's a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Liad P.

customer_reviews.title: Great product !
customer_reviews.text: Customer support was great. They sent me another one for free after my original one wasn’t working after a while. Our new one is great.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly and so much neater than all the wires ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly and so much neater than all the wires for multiple phones. We keep it in the kitchen and my husband and I both put our phones on it as soon as we come home.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Great charger
customer_reviews.text: Charger works great! Charges 2 IPhones at one time. Shuts downs automatically when phones are charged. Wonderful product at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: D. Radabaugh

customer_reviews.title: Great Wireless Charger
customer_reviews.text: I use this charging pad to charge my iPhone and AirPods simultaneously while I sleep. It seems to charge just as fast as any lightning cable, and is incredibly easy to set up and use. Overall, it’s a great product and I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Chase

customer_reviews.title: Great design and quick charging
customer_reviews.text: The design is sleek looking and it comes with an AC adapter and cord. The charging function works great. I thought the price was reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Won't recommend
customer_reviews.text: Takes longer to charge than using wire charger. The charge doesn't last as long as wire charge. Would have returned but I threw away the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: CLean up your tangled charging cords
customer_reviews.text: Works just as advertised, would reccomend it to everyone. My wife just loves the no cords and hassle free charging
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Works as described
customer_reviews.text: So far, so Good! I have been using this charger for about 1 month and its still working perfectly. It works as described and charges my iPhone 11 Pro & AirPods nightly without any issues. The white color is nice and the charger looks clean, doesn’t clutter up my nightstand. As long as this keeps working, I would recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: Scam
customer_reviews.text: Scam doesn’t charge. Very touchy if you don’t have it in just the right position
customer_reviews.author: Gale Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Functional, sleek, good product
customer_reviews.text: I like the product so far, it’s a little finicky when placing devices on the pad. You have to make sure to center your phone or wireless charging cases on the right spot. Another plus was this comes in white(harder to find than I thought) so it matched my room setup. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Merritt

customer_reviews.title: Nice charger
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. We plug it in only when used to charge our 8X and 10 iphones. Works very well
customer_reviews.author: Don M.

customer_reviews.title: defective device
customer_reviews.text: Two device charger does not work on one side. Seller offered to replace it but have never heard back from them. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: macneanie

customer_reviews.title: Quit working after a short time.
customer_reviews.text: This never worked that great. It would charge and then just a few minutes later it would stop. Now it just goes on and off continually. So it doesn’t work. Really disappointing. Wish I could return. This should last longer than 30 days.
customer_reviews.author: theforce22

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and effective
customer_reviews.text: Sleek design. Just place your phone over pad and it charges. I have a case over my phone, and it charges just fine with it on.
customer_reviews.author: Javier Z Guzman

customer_reviews.title: No longer works properly after 6 months of use
customer_reviews.text: This charger is going into the trash after 6 months of use. It will no longer charge my iPhone and both charger and iPhone was hot. There is no issue charging my phone on another charger, so my phone is not the problem. Disappointing to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I love this charger. Plus it looks really cool.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Rose

customer_reviews.title: Great and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this charger for my boyfriend for Christmas. He has an iPhone and really loves it! It charges through his case, which was a big plus for him. Super easy to use and looks nice enough to leave out on the table.
customer_reviews.author: Stefhanie Ulfig

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the new AirPods with Wireless Charger
customer_reviews.text: Love the LEDs to indicate that it’s charging. Looks very slick. Even has ports in the back to support Lightning and USB charging if you have additional devices. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Does not charge iphone quickly
customer_reviews.text: I would say that this charger is 50% slower than a standard iPhone charger. If you are not in a hurry this charger is fine. Overnight charging etc.
customer_reviews.author: HistoryBuff

customer_reviews.title: Great Charging Pad!
customer_reviews.text: We received the charging pad several days ago. We plugged it in and began using it right away. We placed our two cell phones on it and it didn't take long at all until they were both fully charged. We're very happy with the pad.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Works great with 2 phones. Can be temperamental on the exact placement of the phones to be sure they charge.
customer_reviews.author: Mike K.

customer_reviews.title: Ve.ry pleased
customer_reviews.text: Unite works as it should. Very happy with unit and how quickly it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: R. WINCHESTER

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t charge my phone unless it’s perfectly centered. The longer I have it the slower my phone chargers on it !
customer_reviews.author: Destiny

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered two units; one worked perfectly and the other was faulty. I have contacted their customer service and they have sent me a replacement unit. 5 stars to both the product and customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Adel Alfalasi

customer_reviews.title: Microwave
customer_reviews.text: This charger is a good idea but for some reason it sucks. If you leave the AirPods on for too long they will literally become too hot to touch. It cooks everything you put on it. This charger is junk and I would not recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Montminy

customer_reviews.title: Nice to be able to charge two devices, but sometime it gets glitchy and doesn't recognize your phone
customer_reviews.text: Overall ok...problem seems to be solved when you unplug and re-plug the devise, but for a 'premium' product you would like to think it would work more consistently than it has.
customer_reviews.author: Mr T

customer_reviews.title: Replace the included USB cable!
customer_reviews.text: The included USB cable was not keeping the charger base connected to power. I replaced it with a USB to lighting cable and the charger stays connected. The charger itself is nice and thin. However, the included USB cable could be of better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing charger, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. It’s so easy to walk in the door and lay our phones down to charge.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Rarely charges 2 phones at a time
customer_reviews.text: Love the design and being able to charge 2 phones at once except the 90% of the time it doesn’t work. It charges one phone without issue but add a second and it makes a funny sound and you have to move it around just right for it to charge.
customer_reviews.author: Liz N

customer_reviews.title: Ruined my iPhone battery
customer_reviews.text: This item ruined my iPhone XS battery. My battery drains so fast now. I brought it to apple and it was one of the first things they asked. Such BS they can sell stuff that ruins your phone battery. Thx a lot
customer_reviews.author: Candy Guo

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, ideal for a slow overnight charge. It even appears to shut off after fully charged.
customer_reviews.author: reugenio

customer_reviews.title: Much higher quality than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and quality made. I can use USB C to power it!
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Short lived
customer_reviews.text: Product stopped charging after 3 months. Save your money and buy from elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: pmoua

customer_reviews.title: Order product that matches your model
customer_reviews.text: Using product charge 2 iPhone 8’s Simple to use. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Eric Smith

customer_reviews.title: Can’t use with a magnet on phone
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t use it bc I have a magnet on my phone for my car cell phone holder.
customer_reviews.author: KCFlorida

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Was not able to charge an iWatch via USB while charging two phones. It burned after 1.5yrs of use.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Nieves

customer_reviews.title: This is a good value.
customer_reviews.text: $35 to the door, 18W charging brick included. This is a good value.
customer_reviews.author: fladtheimpaler®

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable
customer_reviews.text: Charges my iPhone every other night. I wake up and it sometimes hasn’t charged so I have to use my cord. Really annoying. Wish I could return this.
customer_reviews.author: Edubs4

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Great addition for our kitchen! We can charge multiple phones at once as well as AirPods.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good dual charger for the price. The only complaint is that it has to be on the charger a certain way in order for it to charge.
customer_reviews.author: EBlanks

customer_reviews.title: Not compatible with Apple Products.
customer_reviews.text: This product is supposed to work for both apple and android. It charges my Samsung galaxy s10 but will not charge my iPhone X or apple watch.
customer_reviews.author: Charles R. Tomblin II

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: It stopped working about a month of use. It lights up but when putting phone on for charge it shuts down.
customer_reviews.author: yangmee valles

customer_reviews.title: Excellent device
customer_reviews.text: This charging station is perfect for our needs, it is aesthetically pleasing and it works.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 1 month
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working/charging completely after a little over 1 month of use. Lights no longer turn on. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For the price this product is a great deal for sure
customer_reviews.text: Had used it for a week now. Well made. Works as expected. For the price this product is a great deal for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel W Schallock

customer_reviews.title: Charger
customer_reviews.text: It is really easy to set up and it’s a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product! Fast shipping!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Charges my iPhone 8 Plus and my husbands iPhone 8 at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Sanders

customer_reviews.title: I have no headline
customer_reviews.text: It is slim, looks nice and seems to work well
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Bianccucci

customer_reviews.title: DOESN'T CHARGE
customer_reviews.text: I bought this with the promise of charging multiple phones at a time wirelessly, however this pad can barely handle charging a single phone. I place it on the pad and it indicates that is charging by the flashing blue light. When I return to my phone an hour or two later, it will only be charged by 1 or 2 percent. This charger certainly pales in comparison to my Samsung wireless charger that I use for my iPhone X.
customer_reviews.author: Amar

customer_reviews.title: Slowest charger I've EVER owned
customer_reviews.text: This charger has the slowest charge that I've ever experienced in my entire life. My phone spent 1 hour on it and it charged lesser than 20%. Also its super slippery so if your phone is on vibrate and you receive a text, email, or call it will slide right off of the dock.
customer_reviews.author: MARIA RODRIGUEZ

product_meta.title: LXORY Wireless Charging Station 3 in 1 for iPhone 8/x/11 Airpods Galaxy Note S8/9/10/ and All Other Qi Enabled Wireless Charging Devices - Fast Dual Wireless Charger qi Pad (18W AC Adapter Included)
feature_bullets: JUST LIKE HAVING A DOUBLE GARAGE MAKES SENSE IF YOU HAVE TWO CARS, Our Dual Wireless Fast Charger Pad is the smarter choice if you have or plan to have two wireless charging ready devices. You won't have to buy a second fast charging wireless charger. Save money and desktop space by buying a two phone charging station for multiple devices right away.

CHARGE UP TO THREE DEVICES AT ONCE! The LXORY Qi Dual Wireless Charger comes with two Qi charging pads and one USB power outlet so you can charge a third device using a USB cable of your preference. Can be used as an AirPod wireless charger for AirPods wireless charging case. Qualcomm 18W QuickCharge Adapter is included.

BUILT-IN THERMO PROTECTION. A Wireless iPhone charger gets warm while charging. Cheap chargers can overheat your iphones. We included a temperature sensor in the two phone wireless charger which will limit the maximum temperature of the transmitters to a safe range. So that your phone is protected from heat damage.

SIMPLE TO SET UP AND EASY TO USE. Plug the adapter (included) into the wall, connect the charging pad using the USB cable (included), place your Qi-enabled phone on one of the transmitter pads - done. Your phone is now charging with ‘no strings attached’.

SLIM AND STYLISH LXORY-DESIGN. Only 9mm thick and 8” wide, this charger takes up a minimal amount of space and looks great on any counter or table top. Comes with anti-slip rubber feet, a Wall Charger and a USB cable. NOTE: This device does NOT charge your Apple Watch wirelessly.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars368 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
